title: [Infra] Containerize .NET API
description: Create a Dockerfile for the ASP.NET Core Web API and add it to a docker-compose.yml file. Verify it builds and runs.
label: infrastructure

title: [Infra] Containerize Python FastAPI
description: Create a Dockerfile for the Python FastAPI service. Add it to docker-compose.yml. Ensure the containers can 'ping' each other.
label: infrastructure

title: [AI] Mock Data & FastAPI Skeleton
description: Create a 'data/' folder with a 50-row sample CSV of expenses. Setup a FastAPI POST route that returns a static JSON category.
label: ai

title: [AI] Implement Scikit-Learn Vectorizer
description: Write the Python logic to convert expense descriptions into numbers using CountVectorizer. Test with a simple script.
label: ai

title: [AI] Train Naive Bayes Classifier
description: Train a Naive Bayes model on the CSV data and save the model as a .pkl file. Update FastAPI to use this file.
label: ai

title: [Backend] Create AI Proxy Service
description: Implement a C# Service class that uses IHttpClientFactory to call the Python container and deserialize the response.
label: backend

title: [Frontend] Ionic Shell & Navigation
description: Generate the Ionic Angular project. Set up a simple 'Home' and 'Add Expense' tab structure.
label: frontend

title: [Frontend] Expense Input Component
description: Build the UI form for entering an expense description and amount. Add a 'Suggesting...' loading state for the category.
label: frontend

title: [Integration] Connect Form to AI
description: Link the Angular form to the .NET API. Ensure that as the user types, the predicted category updates in the UI.
label: frontend

title: [Mobile] Capacitor iOS/Android Setup
description: Add @capacitor/core and @capacitor/cli. Generate the Android/iOS folders and run the app on a physical device or emulator.
label: mobile
